'The Features' are a Southern American indie rock band from Tennessee. Since
releasing [[The Beginning EP]] in 2003, the Nashville-based combo have
established themselves as one of the most exciting and imaginative bands working
today. Falling somewhere in the middle between mainstream and hipster, their
sound is an amalgamation of influences and inspirationsâspanning elements of
Krautrock, indie, psychedelia, and classic AOR.
